{?DAYS}You've been managing the brothel at {SETTLEMENT_NAME} for {NUMBER_OF_DAYS} {?PLURAL}days{?}day{\?}.{?}You're managing the brothel at {SETTLEMENT_NAME}.{\?} Waiting for a customer...

{?DAYS}You've been forced to work as a prostitute at {SETTLEMENT_NAME} for {NUMBER_OF_DAYS} {?PLURAL}days{?}day{\?}.{?}You're being forced to work as a prostitute at {SETTLEMENT_NAME}.{\?}
The brothel is closed due to the siege. You hope your guards don't get any ideas about taking out their stress on your ass...

{?DAYS}You've been a prostitute at {SETTLEMENT_NAME} for {NUMBER_OF_DAYS} {?PLURAL}days{?}day{\?}.{?}You are a prostitute at {SETTLEMENT_NAME}.{\?}
The brothel is closed due to the siege. This seems distinctly unfair, as who could possibly need a bit of relaxation more than men suffering the stress of imminent combat?
